channel.title: Dev Grumps
channel.itunes:author: Adam Morrell, Kaleb Knoettgen
channel.itunes:subtitle: A deep dive into game development and design
channel.description: Dev Grumps is a Podcast by Adam (Creator of Space Dodo) and Kaleb (Creator of S.M.A.C.K.) give hot takes and commentary on the game design of the games that inspire us.

item.author: Adam Morrell, Kaleb Knoettgen
item.itunes:author: Adam Morrell, Kaleb K.
item.title: Do Game Stories Matter? Dev Grumps Ep. 1
item.description: 2 Game developers talk about uninspired game creations, beginner pitfalls, and what makes a good game. -Show Notes- Space Dodo on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1FwpA43c9h4X6KjupfGwlA Kaleb's Free Game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2118060/SMACK/ SMACK discord: https://discord.gg/kSSGngTR Adam's Itch (Some small VR games free): https://spacedodo88.itch.io/
